name: Apple iPhone 6 (Gold, 32 GB)
review title: Selling counterfeit/ duplicate charger with ipho
content:
BEWARE all, they sell counterfeit/ duplicate phone assessories with original phone. They open original Phone boxes and change original assesory with duplicate, this is the only way, they are selling phones cheaper then open market. #FLIPKART shame on you & on your vendor. Purchased iPhone 6 under Diwali Offer for Rs24,000/. Charger was not working, went to Apple authorised service center, they told and gave in writing cable is of third party and not original as compared with Apple original cable and found discrepancy in the serial number and hence, warranty coverage declined.
Please dont buy anything from Flipkart. READ MORE

To be true I was afraid to buy this in flipkart after reading the reviews that were posted recently.Reviews had one star people complaining about battery and screen issues.

There's nothing new to say about the phone.Apple always meets the requirements absolutely excellent specs.Battery is great unlike the 5s which drains a lot with mobile data. READ MORE

name: Apple iPhone 6 (Gold, 32 GB)
content:
Well to begin with the product is good and authentic however the one thing that made me regret buying from Flipkart was the delivery time and ekart logistics. First of all horrible customer service by Flipkart and ekart logisics. I mean first of all the product was not delivered on the promised date and on top of it no resolution provided by Flipkart customer service all they tell you is to wait. I mean how does it help if I have to wait!! waiting is the issue...thats why we call.
Now moving on to the logistics Ekart is the worst and horrible logistic provider. I am into regular online shopping and never faced any issue with the logistics partner however when I called this particular delivery agent to provide me with the product before 5 he straight away denied and said I will deliver it to your neighbour or will come tomorrow. Now as it is the product is late and you are then telling me to deliver it to my neighbour...who takes the responsbility!! pathetic pathetic delivery experience never ever going to order from flipkart!! READ MORE

name: Apple iPhone 6 (Gold, 32 GB)
review title: Pretty nice product whole up to the mark ....
content:
The product i am using since 3 weeks and it felt me very happy and very enjoying with it tooooo
....on the basis of three things m dividing the review
1. Look and feels
As this phone is very minimilistic the n handling and very perfectly fits to your palm and gives a lovely accent while using and looks are dedicatedly fine and perfecttt a mobile phone to be
2. Software and hardware :-
Software you get ios 10.2 out of the box and it is even pretty well and easy tooooo to use and fast too camera is decent and fulfils a good job while in daylight it is perfectly clear and in low light toooo it gives pretty well pictures
Processor is too good as we can't compare it with snapdragons latest ones but it is just a dual core processor and never lets you feel backward than other android device so go for it without any worry regarding processing or camera or display as it is stunning well
3. Battery
One if the most important and mandatory component of mobile phone so this thing in case of iPhone 6 we have1810 mAh battery which have a decent life throughout the day and if you are a havy gamer then you have to charge it twice a day to peak and averagely the battery backup is stunning well

At last it is an apple phone so you have not to worry regarding the products other info and charging is still prety fast so go for it friends READ MORE

name: Apple iPhone 6 (Gold, 32 GB)
review title: Trust me, you won't regret it.
content:
I had ordered product on 17th of may 2017, and I received the product today on 22nd of may 2017. To be honest, I was getting cold sweat while ordering the product, because of the several awful rumors.
But, I had taken a leap of faith and ordered the product, and all those rumors seems farce right now. Product is genuine and filpkart service is absolutely top class. I thank the seller SuperComNet and filpkart for giving me the genuine iPhone at such a low price.
You guys, don't think much, just go for it. You won't regret it. READ MORE

content: I would suggest not to buy costly products from Flipkart. I got my phone delivered in super fast speed (within 14-15 hrs of ordering) phone's ear volume is highest and still unable to hear anything, i thought lets try putting it on speaker, then i found that person on other side was unable to hear. Ridiculous it is...I have been trying to get in touch with them however they kept me waiting for around an hour on call and later they said we are unable to hear you and disconnected like other call centers do now a days...tried following up on twitter and facebook too but thats also of no use...now i have decide to lodge a fraud complaint against them... content: Simply amazing!! Got @18400 on last bbd at flipkart. Was fade up with my previous Mi phone. So, this time I was in searching for a good branded phone other than cheap Chinese phones. Lastly choose iPhone 6 over Nokia 6. Very much satisfied with this buy. If you ever get a chance please try to use iphone and its ios once. Believe me, its just awesome.. READ MORE

name: Apple iPhone 6 (Gold, 32 GB)
content:
Really hate the way of customer service & commitment of Flipkart, A brand new Defected I phone delivered to me & after 3-4 days of creating trouble they agreed to return the product. 2 days over for technical visit and even after approval & shipped still they took 5 days to deliver the product from Bengaluru to Kolkata where it took only 2 days to deliver. Yesterday I received a call from flipkart stating that your shipment will be delivered on priority by today however still it is in transit.

21st May 4:53 am the shipment is in transit to Kolkata however yet not reached don't know what they used to transportation likely it must be cycle/bike or Bullock cart. Don't know how they keep the commitment.
Even I am sure that it will not reached to me by tomorrow also. It was supposed to come from Bangalore to Kolkata Airport directly but they send it to Secunderabad .So My parcel is going to do India Safar with the best customer service of Flipkart & his logistic team. Flipkart Please do something to earn customer's respect & trust else it will be the worst online shopping website in near future. READ MORE
